Tavatron relaxed a little, putting more of her weight on Dinobot:
"I fought as well as I could." Tavatron looked at the sky, the sun was just 
beginning to appear over the horizon.

"We've been battling a long time. We best get back to base." Tavatron took a 
tentative step forward, careful not to put too much weight on her injured 
side. Still leaning against Dinobot for support, Tavatron slowly walked 
forward.

(OOC: I won't be able to reply again until about 5:30 pm eastern/standard 
time. I have a club meeting to get to.)

>From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Mon, 17 Apr 2000 17:08:14 PDT
>
>* Dinobot looked down at Tavatron as she leaned against his chest, he had
>obviously hurt her more then he intended to.
>He looked around at the surrounding trees the best he could but anything
>beyond 100 meters was nothing but haze, he sighed and looked back at
>Tavatron.
>How queer it felt to have her leaning on him for support, no bot had ever
>even dared to come this close to him...until now.
>Dinobot felt how weak Tavatron truly was and wrapped an arm around her to
>keep her upright and on her feet, she probably wouldn't be able to get back
>up if he let her fall.
>He reached up with his free hand and wiped the remaining mech fluid from 
>his
>good optic, at least one of them was able-bodied.
>As Dinobot looked at Tavatron more closely he could see her exhaustion,she
>had taken a bad beating!
>He could feel her cracked and broken ribs against his own chest and stomach
>and felt a tinge of guilt for hurting her so badly, he had obviously
>forgotten that she wasn't a Transmetal 2 like him and couldn't take the
>extent of damage that he could.
>But...she had tried and that was all that mattered.*
>
>" You fought well."
>
